name: Military Drones
description: Autonomous and semi-autonomous unmanned aerial vehicles for surveillance, reconnaissance, and combat operations.

name: Dual-use AI
description: Artificial intelligence technologies with both civilian and military applications, raising ethical and regulatory concerns.

name: Counter-UAS Systems
description: Technologies designed to detect, track, and neutralize hostile unmanned aircraft systems in military and civilian contexts.

name: Military Satellites
description: Space-based assets for communications, surveillance, navigation, and potential offensive capabilities.

name: Cyber Warfare Tools
description: Software and systems designed for offensive and defensive cyber operations in military contexts.
